website_summaries.verdict: Transmitter delivers low latency, which yields a good level of quality with no audio lag.
pros: Comes with all of the parts you'll need to make a connection, no matter where you're using the transmitter
Includes a long-life built-in rechargeable battery for up to 10 hours of continuous use
Easy to switch between receiver and transmitter modes

customer_reviews.title: When it worked it worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped pairing after three months. Became useless. Tried pairing with several different Bluetooth devices but they could not detect the signal. I think the transmitter died. Not being used on battery but on dedicated power. All leds are functioning. When it did work it worked well. Update: the vendor emailed me a procedure to reset the device. The reset worked and I got the device paired successfully and it now performs as advertised. Resetting is not intuitive and is not included in the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drymon

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first
customer_reviews.text: Simple but works quite nicely. My wife loves it more than I do I think as I plug this into my stereo and transmit to wireless headphones and no longer have to crank the TV. Update: I really enjoy this when I can get it to pair but I travel a great deal and even though it pairs with my headphones at home, half of the time when I am in a hotel room and try to pair it, it will not pair with my headphones. I assume it is due to the numerous background Bluetooth devices. It is supposed to remember my headphones but just does not seem to work. Perhaps faulty but very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and is small.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was complete with all of the adapters as advertised and all I will likely ever need. Connected to my TV, charged and paired easily with my 2 Bluetooth headphone sets as needed. This solved exactly the problem I was having with my wife complaining about having to hear the TV News broadcasts that I like to listen to on a daily basis. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little gadget!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I started shopping for a bt transmitter/receiver, I was envisioning the things I could do with it. This little dongle has exceeded my expectations. So far I've messed around with listening to an old boom box with bt earbuds. And Ive transmitted Spotify and Pandora from my phone to that old boom box. Great sound and it works like a charm. I was alittle worried about attaching it to exquipment at the gym to listen to their hooked up tvs. Was just worried about logistics with the little chord. But it's so little and light that that is no longer a concern. What a nifty little gadget!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Mills

customer_reviews.title: Probably works fine for most people, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this with a Rayz headset. My idea was to use this to transmit the analog audio from an airplane entertainment system to my iPhone, then listen on the Rays, which only has a lightning connector. However, it seems that the iPhone does not support receiving Bluetooth audio, it will only transmit. So, there is no way to pair this with an iPhone if this device is in transmit mode. It does work fine in receive mode, but I don't need that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Gehring

customer_reviews.title: I connected to my xt2 ear buds once. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I connected to my xt2 ear buds once. I cannot get it to connect again. Latency was too slow the one time I did connect. Tried and tried to reconnect xt2 ear buds to no avail. Turned on Bluetooth Aurtec speakers and they paired instantly to Konecta. Latency is still an issue. Purchased for use with non Bluetooth television and xt2 ear buds. I would call this a FAIL because of latency issue. UPDATE 2/26/18. Issue with latency was with the ear buds and speakers. Works great with my bone conduction head phones.
customer_reviews.author: alien m

customer_reviews.title: Worked but won't last DISCONTINUED ITEM.  THESE REVIEWS ARE NOW FOR AN UNRELATED ITEM.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine until a week ago. It quit working. Very unhappy. I wasted my money UPDATE: I found a previous reviewer who had a similar problem which was corrected using a procedure provided by the manufacturer. Using the same procedure, i was able to get my tx/rx up and running. It has been working flawlessly ever since. I raised my rating from one star to four. Would have given five, but I feel this simple procedure should have been included in the owner's manual.
customer_reviews.author: Babalooie

customer_reviews.title: Fair price, good sound quality, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing not to like! The plan was to use this device to transmit Television Audio converted to bluetooth to a Jumbl Stereo Bluetooth receiver with my old vintage headset connected. Works like a champ and I turned on the Jumbl first to pair then turned on the SoundWhiz (in transmit mode) held F button down till the blue light started flashing and the two units paired to each other. Simple! The soundWhiz is set up to stay on charge on the back of the TV. I am going to have to remember to charge the Jumbl!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Zieman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works great with my wireless headphones. Great sound quality. Great distance. I can go anywhere in my house with my headphones on. I can even go outside to my back gate (50 or 60 ft.) and still receive great sound. I connected it to my radio/cd player, Sony TV and to my ASUS Desktop. Works with any device with an audio output jack. And the best news is that I haven't even tried the receiver function yet. I have not had it long enough to really judge the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth transmitter and the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a Bluetooth transmitter. Can watch TV without waking my wife and kids. Haven't tried the receiver functions yet but it does exactly what I need as a transmitter. Only one issue; the 3.5 mm dual male cable is way too short to be of any use, only a few inches long. Had to purchase a longer cable so that the transmitter sat in front of the TV. Did not work as well hanging on the back.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID L COWAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I’ve made. Originally bought to watch TV with my AirPods. When I was searching, it seemed hard to get all of these features in one but this one receives and transmits and comes with a ton of adapters. I’m not too sure about the battery life because I keep mine plugged in while using. Connection was super easy, even with AirPods. The only thing missing is mic connection (for video conferences etc)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every where on the net people said there was currently no solution for connecting an analog record player to the Bose SoundTouch 300. There was nothing me, actually, a 1200 dollar piece of equipment from Bose - the SA-5. That’s dumb. For $30 I was able to connect my record player to my sound bar. It works flawlessly. No loss of quality or volume. My record player sounds like it is hardwired to the sound bar. Really impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to use bluetooth headphones with my TV. It connected with the headphones with no problem, and remembers it. The battery life is good. There is a very short delay which I can detect if I use the headphones and the TV sound is on also, but it isn't that noticeable with just the headphones. The range could be better - if I walk into an adjoining room it starts to cut out. I was replacing an old set of analog wireless headphones, and the range on them was a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Swanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to charge, setup and pair!
customer_reviews.text: Write up was good so gave it a try. Super easy set up, charging and pairing with my Bluetooth headset. I’ve used it several times transmitting mode with my smart tv. Great sound. I use it for late night movies, loud but doesn’t both others. If it holds up over time, will be a super buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with Headphone Jack
customer_reviews.text: This solved a problem for me not being able to listen to the tv very loudly (so as not to disturb my roommate), and worked great. Unfortunately with the new tv’s there isn’t a headphone jack, so I’m not sure how to use it anymore. Charges quickly and last a good amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Kelligurl

customer_reviews.title: Great. Really, really great.
customer_reviews.text: Reduces domestic squabbles by 97%. I hate hearing the television and I'm not sure why I even let it in my house. Anyway, this product works really well with the Bluetooth head phones we have and I can read again without listening to another moronic sitcom, car explosion or battle scene. Thank you SoundWhiz.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic -- Works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: Use this with a 42" TV and XBOX 360 at shows -- to draw folks to our Merch table -- we host Guitar Hero on it -- two players at a time, with two MPOW Blue Tooth headsets -- both headsets connect, the sound is amazing along with the range -- very very satisfied!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: wolfegang76

customer_reviews.title: fantastic way to bridge old and new technology
customer_reviews.text: fantastic way to bridge old and new technology. I use it for flights so I can use cord free headphones and get the audio from the inflight entertainment. Perfect solution for that. At home I use it for the audio out on my Mac to a bluetooth set of speakers and it works without a hitch. Extremely easy to use and pair to new devices.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schrachta

customer_reviews.title: This is a tricky device that is just perfect for my new bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is a tricky device that is just perfect for my new bluetooth headphones. The transmitter arrived with a charge and started transmitting as soon as I paired it. The transmitter range is limited by distance and too many walls, so stay in range and it sounds pretty good. SoundWhiz is a good supplier with a fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Hans

customer_reviews.title: Problem with connection of plug to unit
customer_reviews.text: Works well . . . but I had to improvise. With the audio-out connected to a television, the unit only worked on the left ear. I changed to another audio-out set of plugs that I had and the same problem occurred. I found that if I backed the plug out of the transmitter a bit, both channels worked.
customer_reviews.author: RichardG

customer_reviews.title: Quit working 30 minutes after first use. The charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Quit working 30 minutes after first use. The charge lamp would not go off and unit was completely unresponsive. I am upgrading my review to 4 stars. While it did quit working, they sent a refund promptly and judging by all the other reviews, it is most likely an uncommon issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.text: I've use this receiver numerous times only to watch TV and it has been very reliable. The receiver is insync with the TV and have had not issues so far. The battery life is great and its rare the I've had to charge it or it has died while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Item description said it came with a auxiliary 3mm jumper ...
customer_reviews.text: Item description said it came with a auxiliary 3mm jumper...I got everything else but the main 3mm cable needed for the majority bbn of connections...will update review if company handles this problem correctly...otherwise it is false advertising. UPDATE: The company refunded $10 for the missing 3mm jumper. The transmitter works great! Satisfied with company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: it's just ok if you want to mess around 3-5 minutes everytime you want to use it to make it work.
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is ok, if you have a Bluetooth headphone on at the same time connected to the phone the receiver doesn't work. It takes 3-5 minutes for apps like Pandora, Spotify, iHeartRadio to recognize the transmitter is connected so you can choose it and play music. Tried to contact support but that is also a pain, there is nothing in their website to troubleshoot just an email address and they don't reply back.
customer_reviews.author: cpacheco

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the current best selling wireless headphones on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the current amazon best seller bluetooth headphones and they work great together and all the connectors you'll ever need does come with this. No problems at all so far quality has been great turns my dummy TV into wireless dream.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: It works.....kinda
customer_reviews.text: I bought this transmitter to transmit audio from an in flight entertainment system to my Bluetooth headphones.....I tested it out on the line-out jack on my iPad. Immediately I noticed a lack of the volume I’m accustomed to. About 25% less than connecting directly to the iPad, either wired or via Bluetooth. Additionally, the volume buttons on the side of the transmitter have no effect no matter how long or how many times you press them....NADA.... I can’t give this product my recommendation. Continue looking.
customer_reviews.author: MiniJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Beware Sound Delay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device for use with a bedroom TV and for use with an electric keyboard. Both intended uses resulted in unacceptable sound delay. Would not recommend for either use. Sound quality was good, but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Diro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent connection with Bose headphones
customer_reviews.text: This is great -- i have a desktop computer at my office that does not have bluetooth. This connector is great and works well with my Bose QC35. I just leave the transmitter plugged in. Quality sound and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This item Works and the only reason I’ve left this note is Amazon requires it for a review.
customer_reviews.author: DuGo2Guy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: so far working well. I connected it to a bluetooth headset without problem. The micro-b slot is a bit tight. Some minor manipulation required to fit it in so one star off because of that.
customer_reviews.author: user990

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Plugged it into my tv headphone plug, and it works perfectly. I like that I can pair my bluetooth headphones plus my bluetooth earbuds and it remembers both! So far it is working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: MikeeWikee

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup for Two Bluetooth Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had a great experience getting the Konecta Soundwhiz up and running on my two bluetooth headphones. I have two Plantronic headphones, the Backbeat Fit and the Backbeat Pro. My wife and I are flying to Spain later this month and wanted to be able to simultaneously listen and watch music/movies on my iPad on the flight. This system solves that problem Note: I originally bought the Trond 2 in 1 version of this device and had a nightmare experience trying to get both headphones to pair. Wow, this Konecta was such a relief.
customer_reviews.author: bnod44

customer_reviews.title: This transmitter worked exactly what I bought it for. ...
customer_reviews.text: This transmitter worked exactly what I bought it for. And this buy far is not the most expensive one to buy, but I think it is one of the least expensive. I bought this because I have a very old BOSE cd, radio, dvd player. Its an awsem machine but its so old, its doesn't have bluetooth. I wanted to play my music library, from my computer to the Bose system. The transmitter transformed my old bose system to having bluetooth qualities. When I called Bose , their fix was to spend $200 to update my system. SoundWize saved me $175.00 Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: John Suchecki

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Once initialized worked perfectly. Pairs truly fast. Excellent sound quality. No real noticeable issues with lip syncing supposedly a Bluetooth problem. Have used about a month now and have not had a problem at all. Customer support nearly immediate, You could buy a more expensive product but I doubt it would be better. I actually did buy this item and this is the most elaborate review I've written. It's an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little device that works!!! Just wish I had one of these 10 years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I anticipated (which is a great thing!) and works as advertised with no issues paring to my phone within about a second. Would definitely recommend to a friend and is great to have on hand for any legacy devices that don’t have Bluetooth, ie cars, speakers, headphones, etc. The list goes on!
customer_reviews.author: HAMPSJE

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this to connect my non-Bluetooth projector with my Bluetooth speakers, and it works like a charm. Set up was easy and it’s small enough to fit nicely behind the projector.
customer_reviews.author: Karóbahúzó

customer_reviews.title: Works great connecting tv and bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great transmitter. I use it on my old Sony tv to connect with my bluetooth headphones qc35. Sync is fast. Device is small. Battery life is good. Sound quality is good too. Overall happy with my purchase and would recommend it. Oh also I got it next day with Amazon Prime and well received. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. very happy with being able to hook it up to my tv and listen with any bluetooth headphones or speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't connect with Bose Wireless Comfort 35
customer_reviews.text: I called and someone told me that they would put instructions on how to connect with Bose 35 Comfort over-the-ear wireless headphones. I called 4 times before someone responded. Turns out, there are no instructions here.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Signorelli

customer_reviews.title: very bad lip sync delay
customer_reviews.text: very bad lip sync delay. Nothing said about the delay
customer_reviews.author: Dan Byers

customer_reviews.title: Would not pair up
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely would not pair up with my top of the line Sony Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.author: daniel rathbun

customer_reviews.title: Got it last week and works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it for three days but it has worked great. I attached it with supplied cable to headphone jack on my tv and paired it with my Bluetooth earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jo and the Missydog

customer_reviews.title: Konnecta Connects
customer_reviews.text: Is compact, is a transmitter and receiver. Comes with all the connectors you will ever need. Had connection issues that were resolved but took several trys and contacts with customer care and willingness to keep at it. Customer care was good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shull

customer_reviews.title: super easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The product delivers...super easy installation...only had to charge the unit for only a few minutes before following the installation steps. I feel like my 1976 Kenwood KA 8300 has stepped up today's technology. I had no issues what so ever with the paring using blue tooth with my I-phone 6+. The sound quality is outstanding. I highly recommend this product for those who want to hear their I-phone music or movies via bluetooth with your older higher fidelity loud speakers. Thank you!.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and was fully charged when received. The transmitter works great. Now I can watch tv without bothering anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Very short range
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this device, but it has about a five foot range. Outside of that it starts to skip and generally work poorly. It also has a super annoying alarm that beeps when you get out of range or the battery goes low.
customer_reviews.author: Paul  N Haynes

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Bluetooth receiver/transmitter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluetooth receiver/transmitter. Pretty much plug and play. Nice compact size, Perfect for the small Bluetooth speaker in bed to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Fraz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little Bluetooth receiver and transmitter and comes with every adapter you will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Isreal

customer_reviews.title: I can no now use my gifted expensive headphones
customer_reviews.text: The gym I use does not have Bluetooth compatible (AirPod) connectivity. This device makes it simple and no wires on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Lewisl

customer_reviews.title: really amazing performance in such a small package !!
customer_reviews.text: ease of use and flawless function from my galaxy s8+ at 125 feet in a heavy equipment shop, the unit itself is slightly smaller than a zippo lighter and will transmit or receive a blue tooth signal and connect to anything audio through its 1/8" headphone jack, comes with a decent selection of connectors to get it done. recharges and updates through a micro usb port.
customer_reviews.author: Karl C

customer_reviews.title: Good Range
customer_reviews.text: I've just used the transmitter function. It works really well. I have some noise cancelling headphones that I use while riding the exercise bike and I'm able to plug this device into the headphone jack on my receiver so I can listen to the TV. Range is very good. I walked around the whole house with this hooked up and could get sound in most of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Erik D. Reichertz

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: using in the aux in for the car to listen to music from my phone and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: byron j patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great little Bluetooth adapter
customer_reviews.text: Great little Bluetooth adapter, easy to pair and no issues with sound quality. In a perfect world I would like it to auto-on when car power is turned on, be able to take calls with mic enabled headset, and auto reconnect when going out and back in range (you need to toggle power button). All in all, no major complaints, works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ironcore

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well, very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Bluetooth device to send a signal from my mobile phone to an old stereo receiver. This device works very well! The package includes everything advertised.
customer_reviews.author: scott beyer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Set up easily, works well. I appreciate all the adapters so I can leave them in place on more than one TV and just move the transmitter to whichever TV I am using.
customer_reviews.author: R. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to enabling bluetooth on an old Sirius XM receiver.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to add bluetooth to an old Sirius XM receiver and this worked perfectly. It is an inexpensive but easy way to do so. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Latency is a concern when watching movies, apart from that this is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This was the only product I could find that had the right adapters to use my BOSEQC30 wireless headphones anywhere, on the train the plane or working from home. Super easy to set up. The latency however when watching a movie is long enough to detract from the experience. Balancing that against the convenience may make it worth it - I will see how it goes on my next long flight and whether it is tolerable. If not that will be super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I fly a lot and I purchased this to be able to use it on the aircrafts, it worked perfectly, battery last almost forever, I recently took a14 hours flight and I used on a single charge for a little more than 10 hours, before going to sleep. My kids also loved (no more loud sound from my TV at night) and both my wife and I can pair our bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.author: Francisco de la rosa

customer_reviews.title: Sound is perfect with no crackling or distortion
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly. Sound is perfect with no crackling or distortion. Connected to phone flawlessly and then big sound. Will be buying another one in the near future. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Sends and receives which I like. Can transmit from audio device to Bluetooth headphones as well as from your phone to a stereo receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Ratch

customer_reviews.title: Good way to listen through bluetooth on planes.
customer_reviews.text: Use it on long haul flights to Asia. Works very well and sound quality is good. Battery lasted about 10-11 hrs, but can keep working when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact size bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for it's size.works well but is somewhat limited for distance. Good for about 20ft.
customer_reviews.author: daryl

customer_reviews.title: Won’t pair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve spent two hours trying to get us to pair with any of my multiple headsets. As of this point, it’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: GranburyAR

customer_reviews.title: Great to recomend to friends.
customer_reviews.text: Its so easy to use and its good to have this one.You cant forget this one Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: VICTOR LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present, have not tried it yet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Faulty  airline adapter
customer_reviews.text: No use airline adaptor is faulty and doesn't fit properly. Waste of money and just frustrated that i cannot use my noise canceling Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.author: R.Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't seem to connect it up to the satellite or even the tv to make it work correctly
customer_reviews.author: nanc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and truly excellent customer service. Got email that included a copy of the manual and to make sure I got the product and was happy with it. Got a follow up email to make sure I filled out the warranty info and make sure I am still happy with their product. This company is an example of how customer service is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: BrianR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Connection from clean 20' distance.
customer_reviews.text: Have speakers plugged in, paired it to my iMac, and can't get clean audio from 20 feet away. No walls, nothing in the way, clear path. It's choppy, music breaking up, Extremely disappointed I went through the efforts to get this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Gasiorwowski

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is the only option with multiple adapters
customer_reviews.text: This works really well as a transmitter from my audio interface to my Subpac, the pairing process is a breeze and I chose this one specifically because of all the adapters it comes with - the only one I found that comes with a 1/4" inch adapter in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item. The transmitter will store pairing profiles for up to 4 devices in memory.
customer_reviews.author: M Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sound Whiz Konecta to use with a new pair of blue tooth wireless earbuds. They synced up almost instantly and has been working exactly as advertised. I am very pleased with my purchase and with the quality of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: William Gray

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: small and compact. receive and transmits both. has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great when you follow instructions. I can get it to work up to 20'.
customer_reviews.author: Chazraz

customer_reviews.title: 4 out of 5 stars Easy to connect and use
customer_reviews.text: 4 out of 5 stars Easy to connect and use. By Heriberto Gonzalez on December 23, 2017 Easy to connect and use. We have got no more wires to connect our different devices to our sound system. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I would like to shake the whole block
customer_reviews.text: Hey Jo I have a Marshall blue tooth is there a way to broadcast from my phone to both ? I would like to shake the whole block.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth j Brazeau

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Echo Dot audio to Surround Sound Speakers over Bluetooth!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic device!!! I plugged it into the AUX input on my Yamaha Surround Sound System. Now I can play music from my iPhone on my surround sound speakers over Bluetooth. And even better, I can output sound from my tiny Amazon Echo Dot over Bluetooth to my Surround Sound System and tell Alexa to play music on my surround sound speakers using voice commands. It's incredible!!!
customer_reviews.author: Russell E. Schwausch

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND EASY SETUP
customer_reviews.text: great sound easy setup used to play my phone playlist thru my old stereo in the garage. wow so nice to be able to play things while i'm out working,great sound and was easy to use aux port and pair to phone.
customer_reviews.author: dennis lavia

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and performance.
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part of this was the receiver / transmitter getting it out of the box. This a great item if your older television / audio components don't have Bluetooth. It is simple to install and pairs almost immediately, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Phillips

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised. Excellent product. Easy to understand directions. I am very pleased. I am using it to stream audio from my TV to my wireless earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful transmitter
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful transmitter for anyone who wants to use a better pair of headphones to listen to their TV. Synced by beats headphones up to it very easily and didnt have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Tried it with wire bluetooth headphone set and a DT-400W ...
customer_reviews.text: Tried it with wire bluetooth headphone set and a DT-400W Radio. keep cutting out when walking and eating. Have not used. May try it on my stereo receiver. but I got it for wireless earphones when out walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small light weight great design
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly pairs easy. Sounds great. very small compact great product.
customer_reviews.author: carywhiker

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Unable to adjust the volume well, even with volume on MAX setting on the device and TV it is so low that requires silent surroundings to hear the sound. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: WORKS LIKE A CHARM BOUGHT IT FOR MY PARTNER NOW I AM JEALOUS GOING TO PURCHASE ONE FOR MYSELF . PREFECT WHEN YOU WANT TO ENJOY YOUR TV SHOW WITHOUT DISTURBING YOUR PARTNER
customer_reviews.author: Mitzie burton

customer_reviews.title: Great products! Used it on a 16 hour flight
customer_reviews.text: Great products! Used it on a 16 hour flight... great sound clarity connected to the wireless headsets (used B&O) - surprising as it was connected to the aircraft system (premium airline though :)) Great battery life as well. A+ all around.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I was sent must have had a defect and didn’t work. I contacted the manufacturer and they were great! They were easy to contact and sent out a new one right away. The new one works as described
customer_reviews.author: Ashley DeMonico

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device. I use bluetooth hearing aids
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device. I use bluetooth hearing aids, very high-end ones. With the device, I can stream sound from an airplane entertainment system or from a small ipod directly to my hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good but there's a slight millisecond sound input lag for TV watching. Good overall for music listening.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, works well. One issue I have is ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, works well. One issue I have is that the on and off sound, and the alert that the battery is ending, is very loud hurting the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Rose

customer_reviews.title: Small and flexible - can be used with all types of devices and in all situations
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I use it a lot to listen to the TV and my music before going to sleep. Also great when travelling and for the TV in the gym, especially on planes. It comes with adapters for all devices so ultra flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Neat technology. I'm so excited I can listen to my TV from my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and very seamless connection to my speaker system! Great quality and sound!
customer_reviews.author: Luckygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great companion for my Bose QuietComfort 35
customer_reviews.text: Flawless connection with Bose QC35 (Series I) and BackBeat GO3. NO LAG between audio and video that Bose users have described with similar devices.
customer_reviews.author: Samuels83

customer_reviews.title: Substantial lag
customer_reviews.text: There is a substantial lag when you plug this device to wireless speakers. I would not recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Mohd Bilal Alavi

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The unit itself is small enough to place anywhere and comes with everything you need to hook it up.. transmission is strong even out in the other room..
customer_reviews.author: Brian Quirante

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well. Easy to pair to my Beats headphones. The companies responses have been beyond any expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Lowpass

customer_reviews.title: Sound is very clear.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. Simple to use,easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Arend Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to install and the sound quality is excellent. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Forbes B

customer_reviews.title: Received product on time and first testing connected fine. Works well with my Sony wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time and first testing connected fine. Works well with my Sony wireless headphones. Waiting to try it on a long plane flight to replace the corded headphones
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Outdoor TV Antenna, Antop HDTV Flat Panel Amplified HDTV Antenna Big BOY 80 Mile Multi-Directional Reception with 4G LTE Filter and Smartpass Amplified (40ft Coaxial Cable Include)
feature_bullets: ※【Support UHF vhf】strengthen UHF & VHF reception, like NBC, ABC, etc. Assuring you more channel reception and less blind spots, like CBS, Fox, the CW, and PBS, etc.

※【Smart pass amplifier】exclusive an top technology, uses an all-in-one design allowing easier adjust the balance between short and long range reception. Build in 4G LTE Filter blocks 3G and 4G wireless signals for noise-free digital reception.
※【Waterproof & anti-uv】get better signal reliability on windy or rainy day and unti-uv coating and provides visual appeal. Fit home/RV/attic/Marine use.

※【One Antennas for multiple tvs】this at-400b antenna is strong enough for multi-TVs with an top Splitter. Your family can enjoy free local channels in living room, bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and garage at the same time, Like news, kids Channel, weather forecast, ball game and educational Channel etc. (Splitter is not included)
※【Easy installation set-up. Get done in 5 minutes! Quick, simple, and excellent! Enjoy your free TV shows!
